content.prompt: The Coyolxauhqui Stone was placed at the foot of the Templo Mayor staircase in order to communicate to the Mexica audience that the goddess

choices.label: was an important deity of warfare
had been transformed into corn following her death
had been thoroughly humiliated and defeated

topic.text: 5.3: Purpose and Audience in Indigenous American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
